 Trinity :
"But maximals are our friends, uncle aerotaur" said TRinity while she jumped to his arms"You told me that I shouldn't  try to hurt them and I guess that they donn't know that I'm a fierce pred."
  Rudra656@... wrote: ::Aerotaur:: 
      He looked down at Trinity and smiled.  "I couldn't let you help because we had to ask the Maximals for help.  They might've thought you were an enemy and hurt you. And I couldn't have let that happen.  I know you're a fierce Predacon warrior but you still couldn't have faced down the dozen or so Maximal warriors that came to our aid."
